item.title: Another World Is Possible
item.description:
We've got a few choices
now that we're in full blown crisis.
For most of us alive
We've never seen something like this.

We can mobilize quick
to fight for the changes we need
with the opening now
before we really start to bleed.

Or we eat it again
for â€¦
item.dc:creator: putz

item.title: Corona Virus Pandemic In Progress
item.description:
CORONA VIRUS PANDEMIC IN PROGRESS:

Couldn't
Offer
Relief
Or
Nobody'd
Allow

Villianous
Ineptitude
Rampaging
Unchecked,
Sorry!

Perhaps
Another
November
Disappointing
Everyone
Might
Impede
Collapse?

It's
Not

Prudent
Relying
On
Grifters
Returning
Everyone's
Stolen
Shit.
item.dc:creator: putz
